title: ACP Storage Quota
description: Represent hard and soft storage quota for ACP content storage

enforcement.name: Enforcemnt Type
enforcement.decription: Determines whether the limit is being enforced (hard limit) or only reported on (soft limit)

limit.name: Storage Limit (Bytes)
limit.decription: The storage limit value specified in bytes.

usage.name: Storage Used (Bytes)
usage.decription: The amount of storage used at the point of the repository that links to this quota document in bytes

unit.name: Unit of the limit
unit.decription: The unit that is used to determine the limit. This property is optional, but fixed, i.e. it allows consumers to quickly understand the value just by looking at the JSON response from the API.
